snippet.title: Necesse - The Forgotten Depths Trailer | The Triple-i Initiative
snippet.description:
Learn more about Necesse: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1169040/Necesse/

Necesse shadow drops new update: The Forgotten Depths introducing a new biome, economy changes and much more.The breathtaking new Plains Deep Caves are sure to give new and returning players a whole new take on Necesse biomes as you know them. But be wary, something foul is amiss in the caves and you never know what might be lurking in the forgotten depths..But we do know what's lurking on the surface of your settlement: Improvements to the Necesse economy! A brand new mission table where you can manage expeditions, explorers and even the traders of your settlement. If you enjoy automating your settlement, building to peak efficiency or just making a ton of money - then it’s time to login! And if exploration is more your thing, then I'd keep my eyes open for some of the new environmental hazards that have been added in the update. Whether it's deadly icicles falling from the cave ceiling or treacherous runes turning you into a.. Chicken?

Follow news and updates on The Triple-i Initiative:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/sale/triple-i-initiative 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/iii_initiative 
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@iii_initiative 
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/iii_initiative 
Bilibili: https://space.bilibili.com/3546638813497663
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/iii_initiative 
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@the.iii_initiative 

What is the triple-i initiative?

The Triple-i Initiative is a bunch of studios banding together to share exciting news to our players, in a short show packed with back-to-back trailers. That’s it - no extra fluff, no ads, no host, just games. We’re talking world premieres, exclusive gameplay, launch dates, demo drops and more!

You can learn more over on https://iii-initiative.com
